content:
Did someone say accountants? Sorry, we just nodded off. But seriously, the following article proves that the people balancing the books needn't always be boring. As we're reminded:
"Accountancy may not be as exciting as the traditional jobs of Hollywood action heroes – archaeologist, super spy, bat-themed vigilante – but that doesn’t mean that they haven’t had some pivotal roles in movies."
Follow the link to find out about the 
.
title: 10 Most Memorable Accountants in Movies
author: Karl Fabricius
